Text.Page:
Crush legion forces in the region and acquire proof of the deed. Kill {@LinkCreature:27#1#loamy sporewalkers} and {@LinkCreature:27#21#Thulsan battleragers}, {@LinkCreature:27#22#mystics}, {@LinkCreature:27#23#slayers}, {@LinkCreature:27#24#sorcerers}, and {@LinkCreature:27#25#reapers}.

Report to Karlaina when your mission is complete.
We appreciate your efforts to pacify the legion.
I have no way to verify the mission is complete. Please bring back proof of your deeds.
